name: very_high_entropy_uniform_distribution

name: low_entropy_code_strong

query: Implement a binary search algorithm in Java

name: medium_entropy_math_above_threshold

query: Implement an algorithm to calculate Fibonacci numbers

name: high_entropy_mixed_reasoning_nonreasoning

query: How does machine learning work in biological research?

query: What is 2 + 2?

name: confidence_adjustment_medium

name: confidence_adjustment_high

name: weighted_decision_all_reasoning

query: Develop a mathematical model to simulate physical phenomena

name: weighted_decision_all_nonreasoning
description: Test weighted decision when top categories don't require reasoning

name: edge_case_complex_interdisciplinary

name: reasoning_code_algorithm
